title: Project poro?
body: does the PROJECT: poro icon count as a project summoner icon for the merch hoodie quest?

replies.body:
Greetings ProRengo! 

'tis a great question. Unfortunately, the PROJECT: Poro icon won't count towards the Merch Hoodie Quest. The list of content that counts towards it are as follows:
> **Ward Skins** -- Optic Enhancer, Recon Drone
**Summoner Icons** - PROJECT, PROJECT Fiora, PROJECT Leona, PROJECT Lucian, PROJECT Yi, PROJECT Zed, PROJECT Ashe, PROJECT Ekko, PROJECT Katarina, EM Caster, Decrypter, Hyper Edge, Recon Project: Ashe
**Champ Skins** -- PROJECT Fiora, PROJECT Leona, PROJECT Lucian, PROJECT Yi, PROJECT Zed, PROJECT Yasuo, PROJECT Ashe, PROJECT Katarina, PROJECT Ekko

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/E2ArVn9s-project-holy-shit-theres-a-lot-going-on-lets-break-this-down

Hope that helps (:
